title: Drawing, "Floral design", 1740–70
medium: Black, white crayon, brush and wash on paper
provenance: Sarah Cooper Hewitt and Eleanor Garnier Hewitt
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Three stems, one with a leaf and a blossom, one with a blossom, one with a leaf.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Floral design", 1740–70.
1740–70. Black, white crayon, brush and wash on paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1914-21-129.
